root.name: Freak Out: Extreme Freeride
root.description: Overview and features Freak Out: Extreme Freeride is a free ride skiing game which features 4 mountains in different landscapes. The player is able to customize and upgrade his skier with licensed equipment before heading out on the off-piste slopes, where the player can choose to do a variety of challenges that are offered, or just free ride on their way down hill. The game was released on PC, PSP and PS2 in 2007.
